snippet: A day after Nets Coach Jason Kidd demoted Lawrence Frank to a much-reduced role filing daily reports, he insisted it had not been a difficult decision to make.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets coach Jason Kidd remains reticent about discussing his decision to demote top assistant Lawrence Frank, saying it was not a difficult decision to make.
lead_paragraph: A day after Nets Coach Jason Kidd demoted Lawrence Frank to a much-reduced role filing daily reports, he insisted it had not been a difficult decision to make.

headline.main: Kidd Reticent on Demotion of Assistant
headline.print_headline: Kidd Reticent On Demotion Of Assistant
